description:
Queen of the Karura tribe, she has supported Yasha`s mission from the beginning but was unable to join him because she wanted to stay with her weak younger sister until she died. But when Taishakuten kidnapped Karyoubinga and made her sing till she died, Karura vowed revenge and joined Yasha in his quest to take down Taishakuten. She is one of the Six Stars. She uses her bird, Garuda, and her magic to fight.
She is killed by Taishakuten in a one-on-one fight. She dies sorry that she couldn`t avenge her sister`s murder but is glad to go be with her again.
name: Karura-Ou
